faqs.question: What are your working hours?
faqs.answer: We are open from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.

faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Go to settings, select 'Change Password', and follow the instructions.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, refunds are available within 30 days of purchase.

faqs.question: Where is your company located?
faqs.answer: We are located at 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via email at support@company.com or call us at +1-800-555-1234.

faqs.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes, our mobile app is available on both Android and iOS platforms.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery usually takes 3-5 business days depending on your location.

faqs.question: Hi
faqs.answer: Hi, how can I help you?

faqs.question: Who created you?
faqs.answer: I was created by a team of developers to assist you.

faqs.question: Can you help me with something?
faqs.answer: Of course! What do you need help with?

faqs.question: Tell me a joke
faqs.answer: Sure! Why don’t skeletons fight each other? Because they don’t have the guts!
